# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width::Int=10)
    lines = split(text, " ")
    output = String[]
    line = ""
    for word in lines
        if length(line) + length(word) > text_width
            push!(output, line)
            line = word
        else
            line *= " " * word
        end
    end
    push!(output, line)
    return join(output, "\n")
end

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines") # Example output: "This function will wrap\n words into lines"
```
